original_title: Sri Lanka convenes parliament on July 01 for DDR
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s Parliamentary speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardana has summoned parliament for a special session on July 01, in a gazette notice.
A debt restructuring plan will be presented to parliament on July 01 after cabinet considers it on June 28.
Sri Lanka declared Friday a bank holiday due to ‘market sensitive’ information in the debt plan.
